camera module

Vision Based Navigation Project Augusta University 3/11/2022

This file contains the Camera class. This class manages a cv2 video object and ensures that each image is convereted to RGB color space rather than the cv2 default of BGR.

camera.py

class camera.Camera(camera_index: int)[source]

Bases: object

Class tha manages a cv2.VideoCapture object. Converts every picture to RGB format.

__init__(camera_index: int)[source]
Parameters

camera_index (Int) – The index number of the camera that you want to use. Begins counting at 0.

property img

The last picture the camera took.

Getter

Returns the last picture taken when ‘’self.click()’’ method was called.

Setter

Converts an BGR image to RGB colors and into a numpy array.

Type

Numpy Array

click()[source]

Method to utlize the camera and set the img property.

Returns

The current img property

Return type

Numpy Array

release()[source]

Method to release the cv2.VideoCaputure object. Call this before ending the program.
